sentences.sContent: Indirect costs comprised human productivity losses and the reduction in growth, fecundity and milk production in livestock.
sentences.sContent_eng: Indirect costs comprised human productivity losses and the reduction in growth, fecundity and milk production in livestock.
sentences.sCn: 间接损失包含人的生产力的损失以及家畜的生长速度、繁殖能力和产奶量的下降。
